com.samsung.multiscreen

Class AudioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.multiscreen.AudioPlayer

  • public class AudioPlayer
extends Object
    The AudioPlayer class allows control Audio Player on TV side. It extends Player class and defines audio player functionality.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AudioPlayer.OnAudioPlayerListener
      Public Listener Interface for Audio Player Notice events
      static class  com.samsung.multiscreen.Player.RepeatMode
      Defines all possible values for Repeat.

        Parameters:
        contentUrl - uri of the audio to be played
        title - title of the audio
        albumName - album name
        albumArtUrl - album art url
        result - callback

      • seekTo

        public void seekTo(int time,
                   TimeUnit timeUnit)
        seeks audio to specified time position.
        Parameters:
        time - the offset in specified time units from the start to seek to
        timeUnit - unit of time in which time is specified.

        Parameters:

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect(Result<Client> result)
        Disconnect from the specified channel.
        Parameters:
        result - the callback to invoke with the result of the disconnect request

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect(boolean stopOnDisconnect,
                       Result<Client> callback)
        Disconnect from the media player.
        Parameters:
        stopOnDisconnect - stop the media player application, if true. Otherwise, disconnect and leave the media player application running.
        callback - the callback to invoke with the result of the disconnect request

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Returns if the channel is connected and the host is ready to listen for messages.
        Returns:
        true, if connected and the host is ready. false, otherwise.
